traits.name: Anklebiter
traits.description: The Gremlin is capable of taking the JOCKEY action against mechs of a larger SIZE instead of grappling. It ignores engagement from larger characters and can freely move through and share the spaces they occupy (even if they’re hostile). While occupying the same spaces as any character, it gains soft cover, even from that character.

synergies.detail: The Gremlin is capable of taking the JOCKEY action against mechs of a larger SIZE instead of grappling.

It ignores engagement from larger characters and can freely move through and share the spaces they occupy (even if they’re hostile). While occupying the same spaces as any character, it gains soft cover, even from that character.

traits.name: Slippery Bastard
traits.description: 1/round, you can DISENGAGE as a quick action, moving 3 spaces in any direction. This movement ignores engagement and doesn't provoke reactions.

actions.name: Slippery Bastard
actions.detail: DISENGAE and move 3 spaces in any direction, this ignores engagment and doesn't provoke reactions.

traits.name: Between the Cracks
traits.description: 1/round, deal +1d6 bonus AP damage a successful auxillary melee attack against a target that is either prone or engaged with another character.

synergies.detail: 1/round, deal +1d6 bonus AP damage a successful auxillary melee attack against a target that is either prone or engaged with another character.

traits.name: Exposed Reactor
traits.description: The Gremlin receives +1 Difficulty on ENGINEERING checks and saves.

synergies.detail: The Gremlin takes +1 difficulty on Engineering checks and saves.

core_system.name: Icarus Flight Module
core_system.description: The back of the Gremlin opens up into a propulsion system that resembles a set of wings.
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, you can fly for your movement. You have to end your turn on solid ground or on top of a larger mech, otherwise you begin to fall. If you try to land on a larger mech they have to make a HULL save unless they are willing. While in the air, ranged attacks have +1 Difficulty against you.
